Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Who's there?! Oh, you don't look threatening. Any chance you came from a place called $Town$? I'm supposed to be heading there but I appear to have gotten turned around. You do? Great. The name's Ulm, and it'll be a pleasure to meet you once you do me a small favor.]
[Name:BAM][Text:Every once in a while, some beastie thinks I look like a snack. A quick whack to the head with a stone pestle will sort out most things. BAM! Hehe...][Default]
[Name:Mortar and Pestle][Text:I've found that there's not much in life that can't be solved with a sturdy mortar and pestle.][Default]

[Name:Task_1_Start][Text: I've been wandering through these woods all day and I'm just too tired to move another foot. I think $Item_163$ grows around here, doesn't it? That should give me the strength to continue for now.]

[Name:Task_1_End][Text:Is that $Item_163$ I smell? Knew I could count on you. ... Ah! That hits the spot. Now then, where was that town you said? Great, I'll see you there, and then we can talk business!]

[Name:Task_2_Start][Text:You call this a town? More like a sad clump of buildings if you ask me... Lucky for you, I am an expert Apothecary. You build me a nice little home to call my own, and I'll see to it that the merchants have more than enough potions and unguents to keep them coming.][UnlockObjectID:18]
